86 Root Motion

It is a Assassin motion set that can be used for RPG and action games.
8-way Run,Walk has been added and there are 86 motions.


5 Combo Set (15 motion)
5 Skill
8 Single Attack
8way walk, run
4way Tumble

If you want to add custom animation, please contact me by email below.
climax0625@gmail.com
Charges occur when custom motion requests. hope you understand
